programme.desc: Rupert And The Giant Egg Race - It's the day of the Nutwood Egg and Spoon race but Raggety has magically turned Ping Pong into a giant egg. How can Ruprt and the friends have their race now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep11
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Eco Igloo - Mrs Goggins is spearheading a recycling initiative “A Greener Greendale” but has been overwhelmed by donations of plastic bottles and compost. Meanwhile, Pat picks up today's special delivery - blocks of ice to make an igloo at the school for their North Pole project. Pat and Ajay struggle to get the slippery blocks into PAT2, then Pat and Jess must endure a journey with the air-con on full blast to keep the blocks frozen. Despite this, the ice starts to melt on the way to the Schoolhouse. PC Selby is getting concerned by the overflowing recycling and deems it a traffic hazard. Ted and Alf help collect the recycling early but some of the plastic bottles spill onto the road, causing a road jam that blocks Pat. By the time he gets the blocks to the schoolhouse there is nothing left but tiny ice cubes. The children are disappointed but Pat remembers thinking the plastic bottles in the road earlier were ice. He and Ted unload the recycling and Lauren and the children use the plastic bottles to make a much warmer igloo instead. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep12
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Reckless Rollers - Pat is delivering some new car wash rollers to Ted, but the locks on his van doors are faulty. As Pat negotiates an obstruction in the road, the van doors fly open and the rollers fly into a field of startled sheep! Integrating them into their flock, the sheep make off with them, and Pat and Jess take chase, creating more chaos on the roads. Meanwhile, PC Selby has arrived at the car wash, eager to get the panda car cleaned for his date with Dr Gilbertson. Unable to help, Ted engages him in conversation about roadblocks - and PC Selby begins erecting them all over the garage forecourt! Having finally retrieved his Special Delivery, Pat calls PC Selby, who immediately packs up his roadblocks and takes them where they're needed. After a little interruption from the cheeky sheep, the roads are safe and PC Selby escorts Pat back to the carwash. Pat and PC Selby help Ted fit his new rollers and Pat becomes his first car wash customer!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo'S Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.desc: The Elephant Trunk-A-Dunk! - Gil's looking for elephants! He loves them all-African and Asian. He's in for a treat when the Guppies fill the stands for the Trunk-A-Dunk, a basketball game played by pachyderms!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Give-Away Day - Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep146
programme.desc: Funny Sounds - When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. But no sound seem to suit Christopher, who has a hard time accepting the loss of them.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The Museum - The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Race for the Golden Treasure - Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Den Build Disaster - Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Satellite flight / Diamond geezer - Everyone is grooving to Stu and Safia's dance song, so the Deer has to stop Steel's satellite from broadcasting hypnotic dance signals.// To impress Lady Fluffpot, Sir Steel tries to get his hands on Jade's precious Rainbow Diamond!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Spring - Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. Will the piglets track down the treats?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Bubble Scrubbies! - It seems like everyone in Bubbletucky is coming down with a cold-even Mr. Grouper! No need to worry; in their very own soap opera, the Guppies will use their good hygiene to show Mr. Grouper how to get better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Great Pizza Race - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Great Pizza Race! Who will deliver all of their pizzas first and win the coveted Great Pizza Trophy?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pool Day / Circus Pup-Formers - It’s a hot day and the pups head for the water park – but the pool is empty! Paw Patrol to the rescue. // When the animals don’t show up in time for the Circus to start; Ryder and the Paw Patrol step in to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Potato City - Peppa and her family visit a new theme park that has a vegetable theme.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep101
programme.desc: Bottom Bump - The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: Glasses - Dee encourages a friend to say 'glasses' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep61
programme.desc: Training Wheels - Tinpo helps Logi-Po to feel part of the team when he can't pull Uni-Board tricks like Doug-Po.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: It's time to visit the farm - JoJo is excited to show Gran Gran around the city farm - it's been a few months since she was last there, and she can't wait to see Melanie the chick again. But where could she be?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Rainy Day - Monty wonders whether there is a way to have fun outside, even when it's raining.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: Flower Power - Monty tries to get his family to play football with him, but they are all too busy doing flower-related activities.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water, even though it makes a mess. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water.

programme.desc: Roly's First Day - As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.
